attributes.action: help more urgently to fight knife crime. Life matters. I want the opportunity to grow up in a safer world where my friends and I can go out and enjoy our lives, rather than staying in and being afraid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is intended for those who inherit the country which will remain long after our politicians and their decisions have been forgotten. 

The children and young adults of today must have the right to grow up in a secure and safe world, and in one where they can go out and play or socialise without fear of being stabbed by somebody mistakenly feeling that he or she has the right to carry a weapon. 

If our government does not make this its main priority, then they are failing us. 

We know that people's safety in Iraq and Afghanistan is important. 

Our safety is, too.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
